title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound
author: oeyoews
name: neotw-play-sound
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/readme","description":"neotw-play-sound","text":"[[在线文档|https://neotw.vercel.app/docs/plugins/neotw-play-sound]]

> sounds from https://github.com/joshwcomeau/use-sound/tree/main/stories/sounds

!! 使用

```html
<$button message="neotw-play-sound"> play sound </$button>
<$button>
Play pop sound
<$action-sendmessage $message="neotw-play-sound" audioTiddler="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/sounds/pop.mp3" />
</$button>
```

<$button message="neotw-play-sound"> play sound </$button>
<$button>
Play pop sound
<$action-sendmessage $message="neotw-play-sound" audioTiddler="$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/sounds/pop.mp3" />
</$button>"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/menu-open.mp3":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/menu-open.mp3","type":"audio/mpeg","text":""},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/sounds/pop.mp3":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/sounds/pop.mp3","text":"","type":"audio/mpeg"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/startup.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/startup.js","text":"/*\
title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/startup.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: startup

play sound
\*/
exports.startup=function(){$tw.rootWidget.addEventListener("neotw-play-sound",(e=>{const{audioTiddler:t}=e.paramObject||{audioTiddler:"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw-play-sound/menu-open.mp3"},d=$tw.wiki.getTiddlerText(t);new Audio("data:audio/mp3;base64,"+d).play()}))};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"startup"}}}
